node.doctext:
One quest is currently active:

[tes]'s quest for heroes. [We Could Be Heroes: tes's Everything2 Heroes Quest]. Even the terminally jaded must have a role model.

Trinkets for the Middle East quest have been handed out to its 28 participants. Honourable Mentions and extra trinkets for this one go to [arieh] and [grimly fiendish].

Details in the respective node(s). Node often, node well.
node.title: Current quests
